name: The Forage
summary:
The Forage is a geolocation-based game about finding and collecting hidden treasures around you without turning you into a smartphone zombie. No data connection required! Very low battery usage! Batteries included! 
 
As you find a rusty box full of electronic equipment, you uncover the technologic masterpiece of the ancient Scavenger's Order: the Magnetron. 
Made from scrap technology of a long gone civilization, the Magnetron detects items while you move around and automatically collects them for you. 
 
You don't have to worry about destroying portals or throwing balls at japanese creatures. All you need to do is turn your Magnetron on, put it into your pocket and enjoy the view. 
Use it to collect an evergrowing list of artifacts made of beautifully hand-crafted pixel art!
